title: ADDIE Model Improvement and Science Education Training Design in Response to Technological Advancements

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theories, ADDIE Model Proficiency, and Science-Related Work Experience
context.additional_context: A blended course conducted in BYOD environments, emphasizing instructional design capabilities in science education to address rapid technological changes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the limitations of each stage in the ADDIE model and propose at least three improvements tailored to technological environments.
Learners can develop an instructional design prototype optimized for a blended learning environment for science-based vocational training.
Learners can achieve over 80% educational effectiveness through summative assessment-centered approaches using practice-based evaluation tools.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Compatible Software

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
